fields.title: Start a Home Compost Bin
fields.description: Reduce kitchen waste by composting organic materials at home.

fields.title: Switch to LED Bulbs
fields.description: Save energy by replacing old bulbs with energy-efficient LEDs.

fields.title: Use Public Transport
fields.description: Reduce your carbon footprint by taking buses or trains instead of personal cars.

fields.title: Fix Leaky Faucets
fields.description: Save water by repairing leaks in your home plumbing.

fields.title: Say No to Plastic Bags
fields.description: Bring reusable bags while shopping to avoid single-use plastic.

fields.title: Plant a Tree in Your Backyard
fields.description: Trees help clean the air and cool the planet.

fields.title: Use Solar Chargers
fields.description: Charge your devices using solar-powered chargers.

fields.title: Buy Second-Hand Clothes
fields.description: Reduce fashion waste by supporting thrift stores.
